beantype.name: org.rapidbeans.rapidenv.config.file.ConfigFile
beantype.description: An configuration operation on a single file

property.name: path
property.description: The path to the file to configure. The path usually is a relative one. If it is relative it is supposed to be relative to the parent installation unit's home directory.

property.name: sourceurl
property.description: Defines where the file to configure comes from. If "sourceurl" is not defined the file to configure is supposed to be already existent and will only be changed from its original form.

property.name: deleteafterdeinstall
property.description: Determines if the configuration file should be deleted after deinstallation in case it is not under the installation root. In the case it is under the installation root it will be deleted anyway. Set this value to false if you want to prevent this default behavior.

property.name: newline
property.description: Defines the newline character(s) to use.

property.name: canread
property.description: Determines if the file to configure can be read (default = true).

property.name: canwrite
property.description: Determines if the file to configure can be written (default = true).

property.name: canexecute
property.description: Determines if the file to configure can be executed (default = false).

property.name: copycondition
property.description: The condition when the source is copied over the target: notexist: when the target does not exist sourcenewer: when the source is new than the target: allows manual and automatic change aftwerwards but ensures template changes being processed diff: strict binding to the source file (manual changes are excluded)
